data.question: What is the empirical formula of the synthesized compound?
What method was used for the X-ray structure determinations?
data.answer: Direct Methods techniques using the SHELXTL interactive software package.

data.question: Is the synthesized compound air-stable?
data.answer: Yes, the crystals were found to be air-stable as indicated by single-crystal XRD.

data.question: What is the surface area of the synthesized compound as determined by the BET model?
What is the role of the [Fe(CN)6]4-, [Nb6Cl12(CN)6]4-, and [Mn(salen)]+ building units in the compound?
data.answer: They are linked via cyanide ligands to form a 3D framework described as a superexpanded Prussian-blue analogue.

data.question: Does the compound exhibit ferromagnetic coupling?
What is the final product at 950 °C as determined by powder X-ray diffraction?
data.answer: A mixture of Mn4Nb2O9 and MNb2O6 (M = Mn, Fe).

data.question: Was the compound synthesized using a one-pot reaction?
What is the crystal system of the synthesized compound?
What technique was used for the N2 adsorption/desorption measurements?
data.answer: Performed at 77 K on an Autosorb-1 Surface Area and Pore Size Analyzer.

data.question: Does the compound lose all H2O reversibly before 120 °C?
What is the effective free volume in the compound?
data.answer: About 14.0% of the unit cell volume.

data.question: Is the compound's structure based on a 3D anionic framework?
What is the role of the hydronium ions in the compound?
data.answer: Hydronium ions, along with water molecules, are located in the cavities of the framework.

data.question: What is the magnetic susceptibility data obtained with?
Does the compound's structure include disordered water molecules?
What is the crystal size of the synthesized compound?
What is the significance of the Fe−C⋮N−Mn−N⋮C−Nb coordination bonds in the compound?
data.answer: They connect the [Fe(CN)6]4- and [Nb6Cl12(CN)6]4- nodes with [Mn(salen)]+ complexes to form the 3D framework.

data.question: Is the compound's structure described as a distorted cubic face centered framework?
What does the ESR spectrum of the compound indicate?
data.answer: It shows a broad peak with g = 1.986, attributed to the 16e cluster unit.
